name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY)
description: Health assurance scheme providing cover of Rs. 5 lakhs per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare

age_limits.note: No age limit for family members; specific benefits for seniors 70+

income_limits.note: Based on deprivation status, not direct income cap, though broadly BPL oriented.

common_grievances: Beneficiary name mismatch in SECC database
Golden Card generation failure due to biometric issues

name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Income support of Rs. 6,000 per year in three equal installments to all land-holding farmer families.

age_limits.note: Must be an adult with land records in their name.

common_grievances: Aadhaar not seeded with bank account

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban)
description: Provides central assistance to urban poor for construction/enhancement of houses.
ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs

age_limits.note: Loan tenure extends up to 70 years of age.

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment in a financial year to a rural household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.

age_limits.note: Any adult member of the household.

income_limits.note: Universal for rural households willing to do manual labor.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Provides clean cooking fuel (LPG) to women from poor households.
ministry: Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas

age_limits.note: Applicant must be an adult woman.

income_limits.note: Based on 14-point declaration of poverty or specific category (SC/ST/Forest Dweller).

common_grievances: Rejection of KYC due to address mismatch

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: A pension scheme for citizens of India focused on the unorganized sector workers.

income_limits.note: Must not be a tax payer.

name: National Social Assistance Programme (IGNOAPS - Old Age Pension)
description: Non-contributory pension for elderly living below the poverty line.

age_limits.note: 60-79 years get Rs. 200, 80+ get Rs. 500 (Central share).

common_grievances: Declared dead in records while alive

name: PM SVANidhi
description: Micro-credit facility for street vendors to restart their businesses post-COVID.
ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs

income_limits.note: Must be engaged in vending in urban areas before March 24, 2020.

common_grievances: Loan rejection by banks despite sanction

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY)
description: Small savings scheme for the girl child to encourage education and marriage savings.

age_limits.note: Account must be opened before girl turns 10.

income_limits.note: Min deposit Rs. 250, Max Rs. 1.5 Lakh/year.

common_grievances: Refusal by post office/bank to open account

name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
description: Maternity benefit program providing cash incentive for the first live birth.
ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development

exclusions: Not_First_Child (except for 2nd girl child in PMMVY 2.0)

age_limits.note: Age of mother should be minimum 19 years.

income_limits.note: Or holding MGNREGA card/Kisan Samman Nidhi beneficiary etc.

common_grievances: Data entry errors by Anganwadi worker
